remarks.format: ## Remarks 編碼是將一組 Unicode 字元轉換成位元組序列的處理程序。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解碼則是將編碼的位元組序列轉換成一組 Unicode 字元的程序。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)指派每個受支援字集中的每個字元的字碼指標 （數字）。The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) assigns a code point (a number) to each character in every supported script. Unicode 轉換格式 (UTF-8) 是要編碼的字碼指標的方法。A Unicode Transformation Format (UTF) is a way to encode that code point. [Unicode 標準](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)會使用下列 UTFs:The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) uses the following UTFs: - Utf-8，以一到四個位元組的序列表示每個字碼指標。UTF-8, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to four bytes. - Utf-16，做為一到兩個 16 位元整數的序列表示每個字碼指標。UTF-16, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to two 16-bit integers. - Utf-32，將每個字碼指標表示成 32 位元整數。UTF-32, which represents each code point as a 32-bit integer. 如需有關 UTFs 和其他支援的編碼，請參閱。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see . 類別代表的 utf-32
